title: Angel of Death
description: “A dark and gripping tale by a true mistress of supernatural fiction. Karen Dales brings fresh blood to the vampire genre.” —Michelle Rowen, National Best Selling Author "A distinctive and addictive voice in the paranormal genre, Karen Dales has ...delivered a must-read piece of excellence...I love this series ." - Bitten By Books “This was a amazing book and should not be missed... There is surprise after surprise...The author has done an amazing job...I can't wait for the next book.” (5 Stars) - Paranormal Romance Guild The Siren Book Award Winner for 2010. The Vampires of London are being murdered and only the Angel of Death can save them. When Father Paul Notus is captured and threatened with a gruesome death by the Mistress of London and her Vampires, the Angel is forced into a dark world of murder and deception to discover who is killing the Vampires of Britain. Forced into a partnership with the Noble Fernando de Sagres, a vampire of sadistic tastes, and joined by the beautiful and mortal Jeanie Stuart, the Angel seeks out who is behind these killings. Plagued by demons from his past and his increasing affections for Jeanie, the Angel walks a fine line between his heart and his fears. He discovers the culprits but at a high cost - the irrevocable discovery of what he truly is and the Destruction of one he loves.
author: Karen Dales
